nodes.text: Nik Lowe was a Force-sensitive child from Mustafar whose name was in a memory crystal after Order 66. After Darth Vader captured Jedi Chief Librarian Jocasta Nu following a duel in the Jedi Temple, Imperial shock troopers of the Galactic Empire searched Nu and discovered the memory crystal. After Vader analyzed the memory crystal, he discovered that it was a list of Force-sensitive children, targets of the former Jedi Order, which included Lowe.

Nu was aware that Galactic Emperor Palpatine, secretly Darth Sidious, Vader's Sith Master, was after the list, even seeking the list when he served as Supreme Chancellor of the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars, so that he could, as Nu suspected, train more Sith warriors. After Vader killed all shock troopers after Nu revealed his former identity, the former Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, he then also killed Nu, and informed his master that she had attempted to escape, which resulted in her death. When Palpatine asked Vader if he had recovered any information from Nu, Vader responded that he had learned nothing.

Nik Lowe was first mentioned, albeit via their name written in Aurebesh, in the canon comic Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 10 written by Charles Soule and pencilled by Giuseppe Camuncoli, and released in 2018.
